name: In Between Life and Death I Have No Chance to Say Goodnight
description:
Every collector (on primary) will received a .FLAC file which the full version of the song (+ 48.00 seconds from the full song) hit me on twitter @Loudsonic
and if you collect on my second listed (2,5 XTZ) will also get a Tshirt Bundling https://www.instagram.com/p/CJjFGVNHy71/ (limited size, indonesian collector only)

 This is a melancholic rendition work of the most prominent being well-known as queen of Indonesian vintage horror flicks, a collaboration from Loudsonic (visual illustration) and Thisisebo (audial strains) first released as a limited bundling Tshirt in late 2020.
Thisisebo or Rizky known as a guitarist for Asianfusion https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hEWfgiCWI_g and Affangon https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sPUKSYzCSt8

This illustration has undergone many changes during the time, the original version was hitting the shelves back in 2012, then in 2018 was released in limited T-shirt which had a real horror story from a friend, you may check the story in Bahasa Indonesia thru https://www.instagram.com/p/B3uA_NMHsSV/ if you will.

Credit to the queen Suzzana Martha Frederika Van Osch (RIP 1942-2008)
Illustration retouched on Procreate in 2021 
Audio digitally recorded in 2020 by Thisisebo 
Engineered by Madews, and Fariz .FM
